summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center regarding the case against Ghislaine Maxwell. It provides the password for a drive containing discovery materials pertinent to Maxwell's case.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed the letter providing the password for discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the defendant in the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which the discovery materials are being provided.

connections.description: Strauss, as the United States Attorney, is part of the prosecution team handling the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Discovery Password Transmission
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office transmits the password for a drive containing discovery materials to the Metropolitan Detention Center for the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
It provides a password to access a drive containing discovery materials pertinent to Maxwell's case.
The letter is addressed to the legal department of the Metropolitan Detention Center where Maxwell was likely held.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence handling in Maxwell's case as of August 2021.
